tool.name: Motif Enrichment
tool.command: #if $analysis_method.method == "ame": ame --oc ${__tool_directory__}/ame_out #if $analysis_method.control: --control '$analysis_method.control' #else: --control --shuffle-- #end if #if $analysis_method.options_type_ame.options_type_ame_selector == "advanced": --kmer $analysis_method.options_type_ame.kmer --seed $analysis_method.options_type_ame.seed --method $analysis_method.options_type_ame.method --scoring $analysis_method.options_type_ame.scoring --hit-lo-fraction $analysis_method.options_type_ame.hit_lo_fraction --evalue-report-threshold $analysis_method.options_type_ame.evalue_report_threshold --log-fscores=$analysis_method.options_type_ame.log_fscores #end if '$pos_fasta_file' '$motif_file' && mv ${__tool_directory__}/ame_out/ame.html $motif_enrichment; rm -r ${__tool_directory__}/ame_out; #else: centrimo --oc ${__tool_directory__}/centrimo_out #if $analysis_method.bfile: --bfile '$analysis_method.bfile' #end if #if $analysis_method.options_type_centrimo.options_type_centrimo_selector == "advanced": --score $analysis_method.options_type_centrimo.score $analysis_method.options_type_centrimo.norc $analysis_method.options_type_centrimo.local --ethresh $analysis_method.options_type_centrimo.ethresh #end if '$pos_fasta_file' '$motif_file' && mv ${__tool_directory__}/centrimo_out/centrimo.html $motif_enrichment; rm -r ${__tool_directory__}/centrimo_out; #end if

param.name: method
param.label: Select a method
param.option: CentriMo identifies known or user-provided motifs

param.name: control
param.label: Control sequences
param.help: If no selection, positive sequences in the input are shuffled to create the negative set

param.name: kmer
param.label: Preserve k-mer frequencies when shuffling letters

param.name: hit_lo_fraction
param.label: Fraction of maximum log-odds for a hit

param.name: log_fscores
param.label: Use log of FASTA scores (pearson) or log of ranks (spearman)

param.name: bfile
param.label: 0-order background frequency model for PWMs
param.help: default: base frequencies in input sequences

param.name: score
param.label: Score threshold for PWMs, in bits
param.help: Sequences without a site with score >= S are ignored

param.label: Check reverse complement
param.help: Search for motifs also on reverse complement strand

param.label: Compute the enrichment of all regions
param.help: default: enrichment of central regions only

param.name: ethresh
param.label: E-value threshold for including in results

exit_code.description: Error Running combine collection to a file

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This function integrates AME_ and CentriMo_ to perform motif enrichment using user-provided motifs in `MEME format`_.
.. _`MEME format`: http://meme-suite.org/doc/meme-format.html .. _AME: http://meme-suite.org/tools/ame .. _CentriMo: http://meme-suite.org/tools/centrimo
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- Sequence file in FASTA format - Motif file in `MEME format`_
.. _`MEME format`: http://meme-suite.org/doc/meme-format.html
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
- An HTML report generated by AME_ or CentriMo_
.. _AME: http://meme-suite.org/tools/ame .. _CentriMo: http://meme-suite.org/tools/centrimo
